description: Episode of Series "My Sesame Street Home Video". This tape features "The Best of Elmo" with excerpts from your favourite moments from "Sesame Street", all featuring the friendly and cuddly Elmo. Included in this tape are "Happy Tapping", singing with Ernie, Elmo entering the Monster Art Show, as well as guest appearances from Julia Roberts and Whoopi Goldberg. Produced by Emily Squires and directed by Emily Squires, Richard Hunt, Lisa Simon and Jon Stone. "Elmocize"; Coach Elmo and his team of 'Elmocize' show you how to bend, stretch, hop and bounce your way to health, with help from Cyndi Lauper on vocals to keep the energy going. Produced by Karin Young Shiel and directed by Lisa Simon, Emily Squires and Jon Stone.
